extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v2.8.8 - May 18, 2019[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Reworked TV Show Networks. I discovered that all exo forks parse the tvmaze web page titles "This seasons Shows". If your expecting to find a show like HBBO's Boardwalk Empire you won't because it's ended, or discontinued. I've modified this to parse not only that web page but also the page for "All shows". There is now a settings page option to control which method you'd like. The new "All shows" brings in allot more now. [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Previous update I adjusted the artwork retrieved to be based on like count but only tackled movies at the time. TV Shows is now included.
